 2. Qc8+ Nf8

 4. Qg8#

Title: Philidor's Legacy
Solution:

 2. Qg8+ Rxg8 
 3. Nf7#
Text: Philidor's legacy: the classic smothered mate

Title: Philidor's Legacy
Text: Philidor's legacy: a7 Bishop guards the Queen, forcing the white rook to take the queen and unpin the knight - a decoy sacrifice

Title: Philidor's Legacy
Text: Removal of the guard by a simple Queen sacrifice

Title: Semi-smothered mate
Text: Semi-smothered mate by means of white Bishop guarding black King's escape square. Black Knight is forced to capture Qh7 because white Knight guards the Queen.
